word:
Messages. 

     Dear Bro. Uriah: While at Monterey we had a most powerful meeting; the Spirit of the Lord rested upon me. I was shown in vision many things--was shown the straightness of the way, the necessity of each understanding their own heart, the danger of deceiving themselves as to their true state, and be found wanting. I saw again the state of things in the Office, the cloud still hangs over it. All is not right there.
